No caps. No limits. No surprises.

Unlike competitors who charge per user or enforce usage caps, we believe in transparent usage-based pricing. Add unlimited team members, send unlimited emails, make unlimited calls — you only pay for actual consumption at our published rates.

What competitors charge extra for
  • •Per-user seat fees ($129-259/user/month)
  • •SMS/text message add-ons ($0.02-0.05/message)
  • •Call tracking fees ($50-200/month)
  • •AI features ($100-500/month add-on)
  • •Advanced reporting ($50-100/month)
  • •API access (enterprise tier only)
What's included in Thorbis $200
  • Unlimited users (add your entire team)
  • All features unlocked (no tiers)
  • Call tracking & recording included
  • Full API access included
  • Advanced reporting & analytics
  • Pay only for actual usage (SMS, calls, AI)
Why Service Businesses Choose Thorbis

No Sales Pressure. No Lock-Ins.
Just Software That Works.

Unlike traditional FSM companies, we let our product speak for itself. Try it, love it, or leave—no hard feelings, no contracts, no hassle.

No Pushy Sales Teams
Try the full platform yourself in 60 seconds

Self-service signup. No demos required. No sales calls unless YOU ask for one. Start your free trial and explore every feature without anyone breathing down your neck.

No Contracts or Lock-Ins
Cancel anytime with one click

Month-to-month billing. Export your data anytime. We earn your business every single month, not through long-term contracts. If we're not delivering value, leave—no penalties.

  • Usage alerts at 80% of estimate
  • Optional billing caps available
  • Export all data (CSV, Excel, PDF)
5-Minute Intelligent Setup
No lengthy operational assessments

Our smart onboarding asks the right questions for YOUR business. No expensive consultants. No month-long implementation projects. Setup in 5 minutes, running jobs same day.

Top-Tier Support Included
Real humans, not chatbots

2-hour response time. Phone support included. We help with anything—setup, training, custom workflows. No "premium support" tiers. Everyone gets the same great service.

30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
If Thorbis doesn't save you money vs. your current software, we'll refund you 100%—no questions asked. 14-day free trial, no credit card required. Found a bug? Need a feature? Most requests ship within 2-4 weeks. We build what service businesses actually need, not what sales quotas demand.
